pr_title: Confirmation code introspection API for lite user registration.

timeline.message: Add authorization for new tenant creation API.
Introduce API to introspect code for lite user registration.

timeline.bodyText: Why can't we use the existing user object
timeline.author: IsuraD

+public class ExtendedUser {

replies.bodyText: This backend supports an additional attribute 'isUsernameCaseSensitive' related to code, that is not present in the current User object. Currently, this attribute is not used, but the username validations against code can honor this attribute. This is exposing all the details provided from the backend in this API.
replies.author: Pushpalanka

timeline.message: Handling user object to use the existing model.
